dataList.content: And tomorrow, we'll play whatever big bro Baoyu's favorite game is. How's that for a plan, huh?
But what do you want? Here's some homework for you—when we meet tomorrow, you better have come up with something you like, okay?
It cannot have been much fun to be around me, but Daiyu always invited me to play with her.
She was always the first to sense how I was feeling, always the one to be there for me...
Always the one to be sad for me, to be angry in my place...
... It almost deluded me into believing that I was no longer just a gem stuffed in a treasury.
